Pre-Christmas travellers using Heathrow airport later this month face disruption after baggage handlers voted to strike from 16 December. 
The 72-hour strike action will affect flights operated by 1… [+2428 chars]

articles.content: Every year families across the country love to celebrate the return of the Coca Cola Christmas truck - as it signals the holidays are coming. Fizzy drink fans will even flock to visit the red truck, … [+4326 chars]

articles.title: HMRC suffers mysterious system outage as tax return deadline nears - The Telegraph
articles.description: Taxman blames unspecified 'technical issues' for leaving people in the lurch
articles.content:
HM Revenue & Customs has closed all of its phone lines and can't say when they will reopen, leaving taxpayers with urgent queries in the lurch.
